title: C Spire Health - UMMC Virtual COVID-19 Triage
description:
Introducing C Spire Heath, a mobile telehealth app featuring medical services by the University of Mississippi Medical Center. Powered by the state’s leaders in technology and medicine, C Spire Health lets anyone located in Mississippi connect with a UMMC clinician right from their phone.
For a limited time, the C Spire Health app is only serving users experiencing fever, coughing, respiratory issues and other symptoms related to COVID-19. All visits are free.
Download the app, sign up, and you’re all set to schedule your appointment. No contracts. No long-term commitments. No insurance required. You can even get prescriptions sent to your local pharmacy.
